Package net.sourceforge.earticleast.app

Interface Summary
ManipulatorHelper.TextEditProvider Implementing classes provide a TextEdit object.
 

Class Summary
AbstractASTArticle The abstract base for the main classes of the two examples described in the article.
AbstractManipulator The base class of the two AST manipulators.
Activator The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle
ASTArticleActionDelegate The action delegate for both actions "Change Method Visability" and "Move Method Declaration".
ASTArticleMoveVariableDeclaration Main class of the "Move a variable declaration" example of the article.
ASTDirectManipulator Changes a compilation unit by directly modifying the AST.
ASTRewriteBasedManipulator Records changes to an AST using ASTRewrite.
Helper Utitility class.
LocalVariableDetector This class looks for local declarations of local variables, their assignmetns and the references to them.
ManipulatorHelper Helper class used to write the performed changes back to Java source.
VariableBindingManager A class that collects information about the declaration, the assignment of a local variable and the first reference to a local variable.
